meanings.definition: A meteorite consisting chiefly of metallic iron.
meanings.sent1: The siderolites crashed into the ground with a loud bang.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study siderolites to learn about outer space.
meanings.sent3: The siderolites decided to take a vacation on Earth.
meanings.sent4: The siderolites were like pieces of the sky falling to the ground.
meanings.sent5: The siderolites gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting their metal content.

meanings.sent1: We found siderolites scattered across the desert.
meanings.sent2: The siderolites were heavy due to their iron content.
meanings.sent3: The siderolites held a rock concert under the stars.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a siderolite, heavy and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The siderolites looked like ordinary rocks until you picked them up and felt their weight.
